title: Hi I have received the device today by FedEx courier Nothing is done on the issue I have shared
content:
Hi

I have received the device today by FedEx courier after repair 

Nothing is done on the issue I have shared 

Phone is getting warm and front camera takes blurry selfie 

As per telephone discussion with B2X services they are suppose to check the phone camera only for 15 min and if after that phones warm above 45 C then they will do the repair 

As per them my phone gets warm upto 42 C so they did nothing 

They said this is Google policy to check this only for 15 minutes and indoor only 

So pixel 4a camera is not to be used outside and more than 15 minutes 

Nothing is said and done on blurry selfie 

What type of rules and services Google is providing, I fail to understand that 

I am sending this to consumer court now 

Thanks 

Mayur Joshi
